item.description:
Hi All,

I am the Director of Publicity for a new indie record label in Boston called Mountain of Leopards Records. I would love for you all to come out to our label launch party (marking the release of singer-songwriter Saul Conradâ€™s debut recording, POISON PACKETS) at James's Gate in Jamaica Plain on Tuesday, November 13, 2012 at 6:30 PM. Saul and his labelmates Katie Schecter, Mike Greenstein and Kevin Haugh will be performing. Email me with any questions at Rachel@mountainofleopards.com.

Hope to see you there!

Rachel
item.name: Mountain of Leopards Records Label Launch Party
